Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

Translation PCE Module¶

This module converts computed routes through the network topology into data structures appropriate for conforming to the Plumbing Specification.

Module Details¶

Calls:

  • ../service/service_topology_doc
  • ../service/service_bandwidth_doc
  • ../service/service_vlan_doc

Called By:

  • Top PCE Module

API Specification:

  • TranslationPCE
